document_type: ISO 27001 Security Requirements - Annex A Control
applies_to_note: All gambling operators subject to RTS Chapter 4 - Security Requirements

control.control_purpose: To ensure authorised access and to prevent unauthorised access to information and other associated assets
control.control_objective: Control physical and logical access to information and other assets based on business and information security requirements

iso_27001_definition.official_text: Rules to control physical and logical access to information and other associated assets should be established and implemented.
key_requirements: Rules to control physical access established
Rules to control logical access established

control_purpose_detail.purpose: Preventive control ensuring authorised access and preventing unauthorised access to information and other associated assets

prerequisites.description: Before implementing access control, foundational requirements must be met

required_prerequisites.description: Complete physical, virtual, and data asset registers
required_prerequisites.rationale: Cannot control access to assets you don't know you have
required_prerequisites.reference: ISO 27001 A 5.9 - Inventory of Information and Other Associated Assets

required_prerequisites.rationale: Classification levels determine appropriate access controls and restrictions

required_prerequisites.description: Topic specific ISO 27001 Access Control Policy required
required_prerequisites.rationale: Establishes organizational rules and approach to access control

implementation_requirements.description: Define and map appropriate access rights and restrictions to relevant entities
implementation_requirements.entities_definition: Things that perform access, including humans and logical items such as services, devices and machines

implementation_requirements.description: Work to the principle of least privilege - restrict access to everything unless needed
implementation_requirements.approach: Restrict access to everything unless needed (not 'everyone has access unless forbidden')
implementation_requirements.rationale: Minimize security risk by limiting access to only what is necessary

implementation_requirements.description: Account for automation in process and technology where permissions are changed automatically
implementation_requirements.consideration: Automated permission changes must be controlled and logged

implementation_requirements.description: Implement review of approval processes at least annually or based on significant change
Ensure consistency in approach to both access rights and information classification
implementation_requirements.alignment: Access rights must align with information classification levels

implementation_requirements.description: Physical perimeter security should be considered if appropriate and be consistent with access rights
implementation_requirements.consideration: Physical security measures should align with logical access controls

implementation_requirements.description: Where dynamic access control is in play, consider the factors and elements and how they can be reflected
implementation_requirements.note: Account for context-based and adaptive access control mechanisms

steps.action: Establish and communicate topic specific ISO 27001 Access Control Policy
steps.detail: Create comprehensive policy covering physical and logical access control

steps.action: Complete physical and virtual asset register
steps.detail: Identify all physical and virtual assets requiring access control
Identify all information assets requiring access control
Select appropriate access control methodology based on business requirements
Deploy access control mechanisms across all assets

access_control_principles.description: Fundamental principles guiding access control decisions

principles.description: Grant access to the information required to perform tasks and duties
principles.application: Access limited to information necessary for job function

principles.description: Grant access where a clear need is present
principles.application: Access granted only when clear business need exists

access_control_principles.simple_summary: Do not give people access to things they don't need

access_control_methodologies.description: Common methodologies for implementing access control
access_control_methodologies.note: There is no one right way to implement access control, though role-based is most common as it is often the simplest

methodologies.description: Access control based on system-enforced policies, typically classification-based
methodologies.use_case: High security environments with strict classification requirements

methodologies.description: Access control where owner of resource determines access permissions
methodologies.use_case: Flexible environments where resource owners manage access

methodologies.description: Access control based on user roles within organization
methodologies.use_case: Most common - simplest to implement and manage

methodologies.description: Access control based on attributes (user, resource, environment)
methodologies.use_case: Complex environments requiring context-aware access decisions

access_control_granularity.description: Level of detail in access control implementation
access_control_granularity.principle: Granularity level based on business requirements and business risk

low_granularity.cost: Lower cost in time and resources

high_granularity.scope: Individual fields or specific data elements
high_granularity.cost: Higher cost in time and resources

cost_security_tradeoff.objective: Find the balance that is right for your organization

compliance_checklist.description: Steps to comply with ISO 27001 Annex A 5.15

checklist.item: Complete physical and virtual asset register

audit_requirements.description: What auditors will check during ISO 27001 A 5.15 audit

audit_areas.description: Auditor checks that rules, procedures and access control methodology were followed
checks: Access control procedures evidenced in operation
Approval audit trail exists for recent hires
User access matches what was requested and approved
audit_areas.best_practice: Maintain documented evidence of all access control activities

audit_areas.description: Verify documented procedures exist, are followed, and personnel are trained
checks: Leaver process exists and is followed
No access remains for departed personnel
audit_areas.biggest_gotcha: People with access who have left the organization (no leaver process followed)

audit_areas.description: Review audit trails and documentation for completeness and accuracy
checks: All documents classified and labelled appropriately
audit_areas.warning: Poor documentation is a 'massive own goal'

common_mistakes.description: Top 3 mistakes organizations make with access control

mistakes.mistake: 1. People have left but they still have access
mistakes.description: Access to systems not removed when personnel or third parties leave
mistakes.prevention: Implement and follow robust leaver process
mistakes.action: Ensure access is up to date and departed individuals no longer have access

mistakes.description: Third parties granted continuous access rather than time-limited, purpose-specific access
mistakes.prevention: Follow process to grant access when required and remove when not needed
mistakes.example: Third party fixing issue: grant access for fix, then remove - not open-ended access
mistakes.correct_approach: Time-limited, purpose-specific access for third parties

mistakes.mistake: 3. Document and version control is wrong
mistakes.description: Poor document version control and maintenance
prevention: Keep document version control up to date
Ensure version numbers match where used

ukgc_application.critical_systems_context: Access control is fundamental to protecting all critical gambling systems

access_control_requirements: Audit trail of all access to sensitive data

specific_requirements.system: System access points and communication networks
access_control_requirements: VPN or secure access for remote connections

ukgc_application.compliance_requirement: Operators must demonstrate comprehensive access control for all critical systems as defined in RTS Chapter 4

compliance_notes.overall_purpose: Control and monitor access to information and assets to prevent unauthorized access
compliance_notes.enforcement_priority: Critical - fundamental security control for all gambling systems

prerequisite_controls: ISO 27001 A 5.9 - Inventory of Information and Other Associated Assets
other_iso_controls: ISO 27001 A 5.1 - Policies for information security
ISO 27001 A 6.5 - Responsibilities after termination or change of employment

documentation: Keep audit trails of all access requests and approvals
technical: Implement appropriate access control methodology (RBAC most common)
Use multi-factor authentication for sensitive systems
Automated alerts for unusual access patterns
